thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com
thread.title: Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Anonymous
text: I received without a doubt knock off Prada sunglasses. I should have known the price was too good to be true. They did a good job of making them look authentic (logo etching in lenses, signature unique R) yet I could tell by the weight of the frames and the case they came in they were fake. Frames almost felt like plastic. I had tried on the same pair a week before in a store and they were metal and much heavier. They don't look bad though; if you're fine with sacrificing authenticity to save a little $$ then this is the place to shop.
